items.content_html: This project is a simple yet powerful backend application for a To-Do List, built using Express.js and MongoDB. It provides a RESTful API that allows users to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) their tasks efficiently. The application is designed to be lightweight, making it a great starting point for learning about backend development
items.title: Zaki-goumri/todoList_backend: This project is a simple yet powerful backend application for a To-Do List, built using Express.js and MongoDB. It provides a RESTful API that allows users to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) their tasks efficiently. The application is designed to be lightweight, making it a great starting point for learning about backend development
